response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $14,000 for this exceptional item. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while still allowing me to cover the costs and make a fair profit. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 14000}
